english: this small group of people who have dedicated themselves to this cause.

text: Bize cefada da, sefada da sana şükreden...

english: Grant us the patience of Prophet Job, who gave thanks to You in both hardship and prosperity.

text: Hak yolunda olanların menzilini bize bahşet.
english: Grant us the destination of those who are on the right path.
n't ever take your love away from our hearts.

(Ibn Arabi) Remove the seals from our hearts.
Tear it out so we can win their hearts.
May God bless your reign, my son.
Do not stray from the right path.

text: Beni bu yolda yalnız koymayan Kayı'nın şerefli ahalisi.
english: honorable people of Kayı, who did not leave me alone on this path.
(Ertuğrul) On this blessed path we have embarked upon...

text: ...bu uğurda gece gündüz demeden çalışıp, didinip...
english: ...I will work and strive day and night for this cause ...
...and bring victory to our lineage and our tribe . May

(All together) Allahu Akbar. From now on

(Ibn Arabi's voiceover) In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

text: (İbn-i Arabi dış ses) Şüphesiz biz sana apaçık bir fetih verdik.
english: (Ibn Arabi's voiceover) Indeed, We have granted you a clear victory.

text: (İbn-i Arabi dış ses) Ta ki Allah, senin geçmiş ve gelecek günahlarını bağışlasın...
english: (Ibn Arabi's voice) So that Allah may forgive your past and future sins...

text: ...ve Allah sana şanlı bir zaferle yardım etsin.
english: and grant you a glorious victory.

text: (İbn-i Arabi dış ses) O inananların imanlarını kat kat arttırmaları için...
english: (Ibn Arabi's voiceover) He is the One who
sends down peace and security into the hearts of believers, so that their faith may increase manifold.

text: (İbn-i Arabi dış ses) Göklerin ve yerin orduları Allah'ındır.
english: (Ibn Arabi's voiceover) The armies of the heavens and the earth belong to Allah.

text: (İbn-i Arabi dış ses) Allah, hakkıyla bilendir, hüküm ve hikmet sahibidir.
english: (Ibn Arabi's voiceover) God is the All- Knowing, the Possessor of judgment and wisdom.

text: (Hayme) Gitme oğul. Yüreğimi de alıp gitme.
english: (Hayme) Don't go, son. Don't take my heart with you when you leave.

text: Gayrı bu obadan kimsenin gitmesine izin vermeyeceğim.
english: I will not allow anyone else to leave this village.

text: (Ertuğrul dış ses) Hak yolunda pişmek, nice ezilmişin hayır duası olmak için...
english: (Ertuğrul's voiceover) To be refined on the path of righteousness, to become the recipient of the blessings of the oppressed...
(Ertuğrul's voiceover) From the easternmost point of our state to its westernmost point,
we will wave the glorious Kayı flag.

text: (Ertuğrul dış ses) Allah Kayıların ve dahi tüm Oğuzların...
english: (Ertuğrul's voiceover) May God be the helper and supporter of the Kayı and indeed all the Oghuz
